review: Be smart and Invest your time elsewhere.
I installed the game just to add to the negative reviews.
å‚»é€¼æš´é›ªæˆ‘çœŸä»–å¦ˆç‹ æ“ä¸åˆ°ä½ äº²å¦ˆæ€ä¸äº†ä½ äº²çˆ¹å› ä¸ºä½ å°±æ˜¯çº¯çº¯çš„æ­»æˆ·å£æœ¬çš„å­¤å„¿è¦æ˜¯å®ˆæœ›å…ˆé”‹ä¿æŒä¸äº†å·®è¯„ç¬¬ä¸€æˆ‘å°±ç›´æ¥é£å»ç¾å›½ç‚¸çƒ‚ä½ å¦ˆå‚»é€¼çƒ¤è¿ªå…‹çš„çš®ç‡•å­

So let's be honest, Overwatch 1 is better than Overwatch 2. The developers called us stupid, so they took away our 6th hero, and now they are suffering the consequences of that decision. I basically don't play anymore, and I am Top 500, with thousands of hours in this game. Many negative reviews seem like they agree with me.

 I use to love this game back when it was OW 1. I would honestly pay 20$ right now to play OW 1 remastered. Why is Blizzard trying to fix what wasn't broken? Now they are trying to fix what they themselves broke.

Not worth playing this game, the community is some of the most toxic people i've ever met. More toxic than Counterstrike, but that is because the toxic people are the only one's left playing the game now. The heros are completely unbalanced, almost all DPS is trash now unless you are running an Aimbot, which is only 60$ for a month according to a quick google search of 'OW cheats', so you know any kid who has 60$ and nothing to spend it on is cheating.

In OW 1, if you were good enough, you could carry the team with literally any character, regardless of hackers, and regardless of team comp. That is no longer the case, b/c now you cannot play the characters you want to play because Blizzard has nerfed all the dps so far into the ground that if you were given the choice you might as well just play tank or healer, because both will out damage the dps right now, and that is the mark of a terrible game in my opinion.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

DON'T JUST DON'T

I loved this game was one of the early beta testers for Overwatch then the Tumor called Bobby Kotick did what he has done to every miserable title he has gotten involved in and ruined it. 
First it was forcing the game to be balanced around competitive mode and breeding toxcity to promote Esports, then rigging the mach making and "rng" in a way that would force you to buy a ton of loot boxes, when this failed to turn the profits the goblin called Bobby wanted, he shuttered Overwatch and all plans to improve it and made the team accouncement it was going to be replaced by a sequel called Overwatch 2. 

and that's what it was supposed to be a proper sequel rebuilt graphics reworked heroes new maps, and fully fleshed out pve/story mode for the game which was what players were asking for. But you would not need to worry OW1 would stay around and those who bought it would get bonuses for play 2 when it released.

This did not happen in fact none of it happened, they shut down overwatch 1 and slapped a 2 on it graphics are still the same the exploits hackers and bugs are still there, the games lighting engine got a little better but you can barely tell in most maps, oh and those of us who bought and played overwatch 1 what did we get about 25 cents worth of non premium coins, we were supposed to gain free access the all new heroes, nope they're behind a grind/paywall same everyone else, we were supposed to get access to the story mode, haha nope the "missions" aka the sludge scraped off the corpse of the canceled story/pve mode are also behind a paywall.

Don't play this game its community has been beat like a fighting dog and is now one the most hateful on the internet, and everything is behind a macro-transaction, that's not a typo they are Macro-Transactions not Micro-Transactions new skins will cost you $30 the three "missions" are reskins of the old pve holiday events and have no replayability and will cost ya $15 bones, you can buy so many better games on Steam for that like DeepRock Galactic, Orion, Garry's Mod,StarBound, I can go on and on.

Don't Give Bobby Kotick your money or your time Blizzard is dead has been dead since 2008, maybe after the Microsoft deal goes through they'll finally do the surgery and cut out the tumor so the company can heal but I doubt it they've ruined all good will and faith I've ever had in the Blizzard and I've been a fan since Warcraft 1 and 2 playing it with my cousin on his pc when I was small.

Don't play this game or anything from Activision.

Started out being promising at first, gameplay was fresh, especially after the long wait between any sort of content updates from Overwatch 1. But then, when the game started getting stale again, they announced the toning down of the highly expected and hyped-for PvE, which was just... disappointing. 

And then now, they decided to pay-wall the missions except for 4, which will be unlocked over time. But after OW1's death and OW2's downfall, I developed some trust issues, so I don't trust them enough to give them 15 more euros. I cannot.

I expected more of this game, and while I'm sure it's still fun for many people, especially casually, I just don't really feel like playing it anymore.

Drinks breast milk of said employees
Shares nude pics of an employee that killed themselves

I urge you to STAY AWAY FROM THIS GAME. The Overwatch you know and love is gone. Blizzard is slowly turning this game into a glorified mobile game the way they're force feeding microtransations down your throat. All that PvE stuff that you've been excited for since 2019? GONE! It's now just a hollow shell of what it could've been, and they know that what they have is undercooked. And yet they STILL charge you 15 dollars for just THE FIRST THREE MISSIONS. The only reason they put this game on Steam was to squeeze more money out of this rotten corpse of a videogame. Fuck this game and fuck Activision Blizzard.

it's truly sad for THE 2016 GOTY to get overwhelmingly negative reviews in 2023 (only 10% positive reviews) 
a real "look how they massacred my boy" moment
but i am glad that you finally released the game on steam so i can finally say it out loud, your game fucking sucks ass

Very good core game play, every hero is fun to play at a bare minimum. Absolutely terrible monetization. Incredible drought of new content for years. It's amazing to me that Blizzard has done NOTHING accept add a few new heroes in the game since 2016 to really call it Overwatch 2. Several broken promises. Micro-transactions that our horribly over priced. I play very casually, and I have fun when I just play unranked with friends. It's free to play, just don't spend any money on it.

I own this game on the battlenet launcher. I have over 1,300 hrs of game play. I got Overwatch 1 and was a huge fan got totally addicted to the game. Overwatch 2 Promised so many things to us and we were soo excited. Blizzard has failed on so many lvls to deliver what they said they were going to deliver.. This game has some of the worst match making ever!!!!!!!! Support roll had almost no impact on the outcome of the game. Overwatch 2 also has a problem with cheaters who dominate competitive play. And the PvE is 15$ and for this season only.... The skins are overpriced and not worth it... No matter how bored you are do not play this game it just is not worth it
